Body:
Description: Hi Support Team,

Chirasmita, from customer side was trying to configure SSO for Entra. After uploading the SSL certificate on SSO page they are no longer able to access the server console..

Can you please connect with Chirasmita (chirasmita.p@tcs.com) as soon as possible and help her troubleshoot ? Additionally pleas ehelp with the SSO login as Chirasmita & team are wrapping our the POC today.

Thank You !
Ovidiu

Description Updated: Hi Support Team,

Chirasmita, from customer side was trying to configure SSO for Entra. After uploading the Wintel SSL certificate on SSO page they are no longer able to access the server console..

Can you please connect with Chirasmita (chirasmita.p@tcs.com) as soon as possible and help her troubleshoot ? Additionally pleas ehelp with the SSO login as Chirasmita & team are wrapping our the POC today.

Ovidiu

PS: Server address is pwx598s.hosted.endpointprotector.com
Server ID is: FUL1YE02
What We've Learned Updated: 2025.05.22: Server URL is not accessible, SSO for Entra is the name for Azure AD SSO.
Next Steps Updated: 2025.05.22: REquested hosted server access.

Next Steps Updated: 2025.05.22: Received access, and removed the SSO settings.
2025.05.22: Requested hosted server access.
